scripts.docker-up: npm run docker-accounts && npm run docker-products && npm run docker-apikey && npm run docker-orders
scripts.docker-down: npm run docker-down-accounts && npm run docker-down-products && npm run docker-down-apikey && npm run docker-down-orders
scripts.install: npm install concurrently && npm run install-adminapp &&  npm run install-vendorapp &&  npm run install-shopperapp && npm run install-accounts && npm run install-products && npm run install-vendorapi && npm run install-apikey && npm run install-orders && npm run install-e2e
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "npm run accounts" "npm run products" "npm run shopperapp" "npm run adminapp" "npm run vendorapp" "npm run vendorapi" "npm run apikey" "npm run orders"
scripts.cis: npm install concurrently --no-save && npm run ci-accounts && npm run ci-products && npm run ci-shopperapp && npm run ci-vendorapp && npm run ci-adminapp && npm run ci-vendorapi && npm run ci-apikey && npm run ci-orders
scripts.build: npm run build-accounts && npm run build-products && npm run build-shopperapp && npm run build-vendorapp && npm run build-adminapp && npm run build-vendorapi && npm run build-apikey && npm run build-orders
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start-accounts" "npm run start-products" "npm run start-shopperapp" "npm run start-vendorapp" "npm run start-adminapp" "npm run start-vendorapi" "npm run start-apikey" "npm run start-orderservice"
scripts.lints: npm run lint-accounts && npm run lint-products && npm run lint-shopperapp && npm run lint-vendorapp && npm run lint-adminapp && npm run lint-vendorapi && npm run lint-apikey && npm run lint-orders
scripts.test: npm run AccountService-test && npm run shopperapp-test && npm run vendorapi-test && npm run vendorapp-test && npm run productservice-test && npm run APIkeyservice-test && npm run orderservice-test
